title: $1400 Beautiful Almost New 1 bedroom apt for rent on 15+ acres (Harris
description: Everything and more included for $1400 / 1br - Beautiful almost new 1 bedroom with large closet apt for rent on 15+ acres or private land(Harrisville/Burrillville, RI)  recently completely redone apartment for rent beginning March 1st. Apartment is overlooking a private pond. 1 bedrooms, 1 bath. Extra closet space, Central Heat, AC, electricity, hot water, cable and wifi included. $1400 a month. Comes with a Stove, a fridge, washer dryer, microwave, fire pit and much more. More Pics available upon request. No smoking inside but feel free to do it outside anytime. Ton of Off street parking and much more. Pets also a option, fishing in the summer and blueberry orchard on site too for picking. Please text me with any questions, great for a single professional or couple. Text me if you would like to know more, Thanks
